title: Bubble for Android Wear
summary: Bubble is a Spirit Level app for your Android Wear device.
description: - Please keep in mind that the app installs through your main phone / tablet to the connected Android Wear device. Installation may take up to a minute on your Wear device.-  Your Android Wear device must have an Accelerometer in order for the Spirit Level to work.
descriptionHTML:
- Please keep in mind that the app installs through your main phone / tablet to the connected Android Wear device. Installation may take up to a minute on your Wear device.

- Your Android Wear device must have an Accelerometer in order for the Spirit Level to work.
